name: Bonaza Bros Demake(?)
description:
This game was created by using the GameBoy Development Kit in C. All assets and all the scripting were done by myself. There was only a piece of code that I took reference of and built off of it, to display characters and strings (credit goes to FLOZZ Développement GameBoy #11 : Gérer et afficher du texte - FLOZz' Blog)  

I would like to add at least add more elements like some scrolling background and collectable loot if I can for future updates.

To play this project, all you will need is to download this file and you would also need a emulator that can play GameBoy roms.

Controls: Left and Right arrows to move, A to shoot, and B to jump
